busytex dependencies:
texlive: \url{https://github.com/TeX-Live/texlive-source/archive/refs/heads/tags/texlive-2021.2.tar.gz} \url{http://mirrors.ctan.org/systems/texlive/Images/texlive2021-20210325.iso}
ubuntu packages: \url{https://packages.ubuntu.com/groovy/}
expat: \url{https://github.com/libexpat/libexpat/releases/download/R_2_4_1/expat-2.4.1.tar.gz}
fontconfig: \url{https://www.freedesktop.org/software/fontconfig/release/fontconfig-2.13.93.tar.gz}
emscripten: 2.0.30
